name: Midnight Calling: Wise Dragon
notes: Install and activate the game through the Big Fish app, then run this installer to launch the game outside the app.

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Midnight Calling - Wise Dragon Collectors Edition/MidnightCalling_WiseDragon_CE.exe

content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Midnight Calling - Wise Dragon Collectors Edition/MidnightCalling_WiseDragon_CE.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: big-fish-games-app
wine:
  version: staging-2.21-i386
